paper_abstract: In this paper, first of all the distance measure entitled generalized Hausdorff distance is defined between two trapezoidal generalized fuzzy numbers that has been introduced by Chen [9]. Then using a other distance and combining with generalized Hausdorff distance, the similarity measure is defined. The basic properties of the above-mentioned similarity measure are proved in detail. Finally, the concept is illustrated by solving several testing examples.
paper_title: A new similarity measure for generalized fuzzy numbers
